#summary How to check out naclports source code.

== Quick Links ==

[http://code.google.com/p/nativeclient-sdk/source/browse#svn/trunk/src/native_client Browse the code]
[http://code.google.com/p/nativeclient-sdk/source/list Recent changes]

== Prerequisites ==

You need to install [http://dev.chromium.org/developers/how-tos/depottools depot_tools] in order to use gclient.

== Create a Client View Directory ==

{{{
mkdir nacl-sdk
}}}

== Create a .gclient Configuration ==

{{{
cd nacl-sdk
gclient config http://nativeclient-sdk.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/src
}}}

*Note:* If you are a !NaCl SDK committer, you will want to check out a writeable version of the repo using this url: `https://nativeclient-sdk.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/src`

== Sync to the repo ==
{{{
gclient sync
}}}
